long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you need to finish simple time manipulation tasks like converting timestamp to local/GMT date & time. This extension can help you get them done easily.

Just paste what you want to process, and click on start button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! 

10 tools are available for now and more tools will be added to the extension in a regular basis. 

- Timestamp to GMT Datetime: converts timestamp to yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss (GMT)
- GMT Datetime to Timestamp: converts yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss (GMT) to timestamp
- Timestamp to Local Datetime: converts timestamp to yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss (Local)
- Local Datetime to Timestamp: converts yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss (Local) to timestamp
- Time to Seconds: converts clock time in HH:mm:ss format to seconds
- Seconds to Time: converts seconds to clock time in HH:mm:ss format
- Days to Hours: finds how many hours are in the given days
- Hours to Days: finds how many days are in the given hours
- Days to Seconds: finds how many seconds are in the given days
- Seconds to Days: finds how many days are in the given seconds
